name: PEWBALL
description:
So there was a games jam called FloppyJam, where the task is to make a game that is smaller than 1.44MB, the total disk space of a Floppy Diskette.

So because of my insanity, I wrote my own game engine that uses the command prompt as the renderer, with ramp physics, pinball flippers and audio!

Controls

W/A/S/D = Aim

SPACE = Shoot

O/P = FLIPPERS

Aim

Last as long into possible without being touched by an enemy, or go to the bottom of the screen.
